The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 02 April is 41,479 (4,800.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 March, there were 216 new confirmed cases (25.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 March, there were 293 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 26% (77 fewer cases).
